articles.description:
In the coming days, NASA is all set to launch its elaborated major test with its new massive rocket, the Space Launch System or SLS- the agency is practising all major steps to perform when the vehicle launches for the first time. 

Scroll more for pics:
articles.urlToImage: https://cdn.wionews.com/sites/default/files/styles/photo_page/public/2022/04/02/251815-nasa-thumbnail-a.jpg, a step forward in the rocket’s development and one of the last major tests it must pass before the rocket can be cleared to fly later this summer.
